      • CmdInvoker

        public CmdInvoker(String[] argarray,
          File script,
          boolean background,
          InputStream stdin,
          File logFile,
          Par... pars)
           throws EvaluationException
        Creates and executed the script in the file scriptFile
        Parameters:
        cmdarray - For example new String[] { "csh", "-f", "-c" };
        script - The content of the script to be executed
        background - true if the script to be run in background
        stdin - The standard input for the system process
        logFile - The standard output for the system process
        Throws:
        EvaluationException
